descriptionHtml:
[i][font=Georgia] [size=6]Joto[/size][/font][/i] [size=5]-[/size][size=4]The Khajiit F[/size][size=4]ollower[/size]             
                        
Joto-he is a simple khajiit follower,he uses one-handed weapon and he will level up with you.
[u]He will wait you in the Thieves Guild HQ (Right in the middle of it ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) )
[/u]Update:I will add a file with Joto at the Bee'n'Barb inn in the Riften!(Coming Soon)
Note:If you want him to look exactly the same,you will need latest [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]﻿.
Thanks to [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqOt4Uv92KqoWQF95oYoOkQ]GabrielArchangel[/url] a.k.a. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/6719156/?]CyrusHawke[/url] for the amazing video showcase!

[img]http://s44.radikal.ru/i103/1408/67/ceb16f838580.jpg[/img]
[youtube]XkN6XIvME4I[/youtube]

[u]This is my first mod,so I'll modify it and I'll improve it in the future.[/u]

Recommandations:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The eyes of beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46873/?]Thieves Guild Armor HD Revival[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5941/?]CoverKhajiit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]BetterMales[/url] w/ or w/o underwear ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54362/?]Somber 3 ENB[/url]
author: PantheraHunter
